text:
Message 1376 of 4024
I think this is devolving into a fight. I have no interest in that. I don't care to refute or discuss a point-by-point rebuttal. My commitment to peaceful
and constructive communication stands.
I want to acknowledge what you are saying below. Every point. In fact, I am trying very hard to discuss them with you so acrimony does not fester
and deepen by swapping arrows on OFW.
I appreciate your perspective and hope you honor mine by finding time to discuss these for the greater good. But that is not happening. And there is
neither a path forward nor progress.
I would love, love, love to help you share your burden. We can talk and discuss what that would need to look like. But not allowing that to happen
effectively eliminates all chance of that.
It is said that "Amidst the storm of disagreement, the gentle breeze of kind and constructive communication navigates us towards the shores of
resolution." I am asking you to give it a shot.
Yours in kindness
- robert
Sent:02/14/2024 at 07:28 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 08:31 AM)
Subject:Re: Happy Valentine's Day!
Message 1377 of 4024
It's all good... I missed you in flight.
You are probably having another hard day. Did not take my email in the way it was meant to land and have a ton of plates spinning.
I appreciate your apology, but no offense was taken. You are doing the best that you know how to do given tough circumstances.
Have a great day, Christine.
Sent:02/14/2024 at 07:31 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 08:32 AM)
Subject:Re: Happy Valentine's Day!
Message 1378 of 4024
This has been traumatic to both of us in very different ways. I acknowledge that your experience is different from mine. Both of us want peace.
I’ll come back to this thread this afternoon with a suggested time to connect. My margins are so tight, as you know how I schedule my life, that these
threads and discussion introduce an element of unpredictability of time, then throw me into a state of despair and disarray that messes up my progress
and trajectory on many aspects. That’s why I am always wary and easier to just push to later, and not let it ruin my day.
I appreciate your patience.
Sent:02/14/2024 at 08:37 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/14/2024 at 08:43 AM)
Subject:Re: Happy Valentine's Day!
